## UserAgentParams type

UserAgentParams

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UserAgentParams = {
    readonly browsers?: string[];
    readonly devices?: string[];
    readonly oss?: string[];
    readonly ua?: string;
};
```

## Example


```json
{
   "browsers": ["Safari", "Firefox", "Chrome", "Chromium"],
   "devices": ["mobile", "tablet"],
```
